title: SLC approves several new coaching appointments
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket has approved several new coaching appointments, for the ‘A’ team, the emerging team and the under 19 team.

Moreover, the former head coach of the Netherlands team, Anton Roux, will now function as the national fielding coach effective from 7th March, while he will be overseeing fielding across all the national teams.
Indonesia donates 3.1 tonnes of Humanitarian Aid to Sri Lanka
ICRC to donate medical supplies to Sri Lanka through the Sri Lanka Red Cross
